pages.text: $(li)The Phantom Mebrane is an item that can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:armors/phantom_armor)Phantom Armor$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:decoration/charm/lanterns)Ghost Lanterns$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to repair an $(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)Elytra$(/l) too in the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/anvil)Anvil$(/l).$(br)$(li)Finally, it can be used to brew a $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/slow_falling)Potion of Slow Falling$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/brewing_stand)Brewing Stand$(/l)$(/l).
$(li)$(l:patchouli:creatures/upgrade_aquatic/flare)Flare$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/phantom)Phantoms$(/l) may drop this item upon death.
